Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of eight (?) lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393873) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393873)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.16)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Dem. 16 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
